Name: Animal Academy
About the game: ** Game Story ** A baby hedgehog living in a small forest enters an animal academy. The baby hedgehog meets the 8 animal masters at the animal academy. Defeat the monsters in 10 minutes for baby hedgehog to graduate from animal academy. ** Features ** - 9 weapons with animal characteristics - Various skills to feel the power of the animal masters - The tension and thrill you can feel in 10 minutes of survival - Various drop items to help you survive for 10 minutes - Various monsters appearing in 4 stages ** Play Guide ** 1. Earn coins through gameplay. 2. Use the coins to get a perk to borrow the power of animal masters. 3. Defeat more monsters in 10 minutes with a baby hedgehog that has been strengthened through the perk.
